mapper.insert: insert into xhShopping ( shoppingCode, shoppingName, shoppingDesc, enable, shoppingImg ) values (#{shoppingcode}, #{shoppingname}, #{shoppingdesc},#{enable},#{shoppingimg})
mapper.update: update xhShopping set shoppingCode =#{shoppingcode}, shoppingName=#{shoppingname}, shoppingDesc=#{shoppingdesc}, enable=#{enable}, shoppingImg=#{shoppingimg} where shoppingID = #{shoppingid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
